directions: Combine broccoli, strawberries, and Colby-Monterey Jack cheese in a large bowl. Whisk mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar together in another bowl until blended; pour over broccoli mixture. Sprinkle almonds over broccoli salad and gently toss to coat. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, 1 to 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package Colby-Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 1/2-cubes
title: Broccoli Strawberry Salad
